_exec_summary.SummaryText: The accidental release and prevention emergency response policies at our facility: This facility complies with NFPA-58 requirements for LP-Gas stroage, and it is our policy to adhere to all applicable federal, state and local laws. If any emergency were to occur, it is our policy to notify the Williston Fire Department and request that they respond to the mergency.                   Description of this facility and the regulated sustances handled: This facility has (1) 30,000 gallon storage tank in which propane is stored for delivery to customers.                                                                                                                                        Accidental release prevention steps taken: The facility is constantly being monitored for any faulty equipment that needs to be repaired or replaced. This storage facility is monitored and closely watched daily for any changes. The facility complies with EPA's accidental prevention and allapplicable state and local codes and regulations.This propane system is designed, installed and maintained in accordance withNFPA-58 and State laws.                                                                                                  Five-year accidental history: This facility has had no accidents involving propane, that have caused deaths, injuries to humans or animals, property or environmental damage, evacuations, or sheltering in place.                                                                       Emergency Response Program: In the event of an emergency involving our propane, it is our policy to notify the Tioga Fire Department and the Williston Fie Department and request that they respond to th e meregency. We have discussed this policy with Emergency Management Department and the Fire Department.                                                                                        Planned Changes to Improve Safety: We will continue to require that those handling propane to take

the necessary training made available to them and to ovey all the Federal, State and Local Laws. Any faulty equipment will be replaced and inspections will be made regularly to maintain the safety of the enviroment and people in the surrounding community.
